name: Platter Platypus
description:
This game really makes you feel like a platforming platypus.

Controls:

Move - A & D

Jump - W or Space

Platform Changer Bullet - Enter

Tips:

- Keep a good rythym

- Pay attention to transparency

- Get your pet platypus to play

Notes:

- Unfortunately i didn't have time to add any sound, however this game is good if played whilst listening to a song with a good tempo you can keep rhythm to

(I recommend Rasputin)
